name: Animal Brutality
description:
A puzzle game where you hit animal with animal, quite animal-brutal am I rite?

Defeat your enemy to win the game.

Made for Ludum Dare 32, theme: An Unconventional Weapon

Info:

"Distance" indicates how close you are to the enemy

"Flight" indicates how far an animal will fly when you hit it with your Giraffe bat

"Incoming" indicates how many throws enemy will give before it'll give you the real piece of danger
